preamble.P:
You have reached the logically existing, virtual ACE+TAO+CIAO+DAnCE scoreboard. It shows all the OS/compiler combinations ACE+TAO+CIAO+DANCE are tested against everyday, all over the world. We have builds running continuously at Remedy IT, Riverace Corporation, Micro Focus, Object Computing Inc.
The distributed scoreboard is divided into following categories:
ACE Builds for Release [regular|rss]
TAO Builds for Release [regular|rss]
CIAO Builds for Release [regular|rss]
OpenDDS Builds for Release [regular|rss]
Integrated page having all the above in a single page for folks who like it!
If you'd like to contribute builds to our virtual scoreboard open a pull request with the platform you want to contribute. Instructions for setting up your own daily build and scoreboard are available here.
Additional Development Process Related Pages
In addition to the build results found in the Scoreboard described above, a number of other ACE/TAO/CIAO/DAnCE development process related web pages we use are the following:
Coverity Scan for Static Analysis and Test Coverage
The Coverity Scan pages illustrate which areas of ACE+TAO+CIAO+DAnCE code are used, and how frequently.
